title: Speak with Dead
content:
Speak with Dead Level 3 Necromancy Spell Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions. Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell. Doesn't work on Undead. 9m Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Necromancy Spell

Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions.

Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell.

Doesn't work on Undead.

Speak with Dead is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Speak with Dead is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Speak with Dead Information

Description: Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions. Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell. Doesn't work on Undead Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Necromancy School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Ritual Spell: Yes

How to Acquire Speak with Dead

Speak with Dead can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Cleric, Warlock Speak with Dead can be cast by using the following Items: The Amulet of Lost Voices The Necromancy of Thay (Read for permanent spell ability)

Bard, Cleric, Warlock

The Amulet of Lost Voices

The Necromancy of Thay (Read for permanent spell ability)

Speak with Dead Tips & Notes

Speak with Dead is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. Corpses you kill may refrain from speaking with the caster. Circumvent this using the Disguise Self (also a ritual spell) first. Certain attacks' or spells' killing blow effect may cause the body to be "damaged", rendering a recently killed corpse unusable for "Speak with Dead". Be mindful of how you finish your targets if you want to keep them intact for the spell to work.
